quote: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

quote: Dream big. Start small. Act now.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
author: Beverly Sills

quote: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Work hard in silence. Let success make the noise.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.
author: Unknown

quote: Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally, it comes from what you do consistently.
author: Marie Forleo

quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
author: Unknown

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

quote: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quote: Don’t stop until you’re proud.
author: Unknown

quote: Small progress is still progress.
author: Unknown

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: If it doesn’t challenge you, it won’t change you.
author: Fred DeVito

quote: Study while others are sleeping; work while others are loafing.
author: William A. Ward

quote: Don’t wish it were easier; wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Strive for progress, not perfection.
author: Unknown

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: You are capable of more than you know.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Don’t let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Stay positive, work hard, make it happen.
author: Unknown

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: If you want something you’ve never had, you must be willing to do something you’ve never done.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Consistency is what transforms average into excellence.
author: Unknown

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Success is built on discipline and determination.
author: Unknown

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Motivation gets you going, but discipline keeps you growing.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
author: Unknown

quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
author: Unknown

quote: Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: You don’t drown by falling in the water; you drown by staying there.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh

quote: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
author: Unknown

quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
author: John Wooden

quote: Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: You are stronger than you think.
author: Unknown

quote: Do what you have to do until you can do what you want to do.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The more you learn, the more you earn.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Difficulties in life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
author: Dan Reeves

quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
author: Walter Elliot

quote: You can if you think you can.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quote: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
author: Unknown

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: The best investment you can make is in yourself.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Success is not for the lazy.
author: Unknown

quote: The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
author: George Washington

quote: Dream it. Believe it. Build it.
author: Unknown

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: You don’t get what you wish for; you get what you work for.
author: Unknown

quote: Struggling is part of learning.
author: Unknown

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you.
author: Steve Martin

quote: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
author: Unknown

quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The only limit is the one you set yourself.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Be stronger than your excuses.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Your education is a dress rehearsal for a life that is yours to lead.
author: Nora Ephron

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Success is not about luck, it’s about effort.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t decrease the goal. Increase the effort.
author: Tom Coleman

quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.

quote: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: A little progress each day adds up to big results.
author: Unknown

quote: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you.

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

quote: The harder you work, the luckier you get.
author: Gary Player

quote: Success is built on daily habits, not once-in-a-lifetime transformations.

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: The expert at anything was once a beginner who refused to give up.
author: Unknown

quote: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.

quote: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal.

quote: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.

quote: The difference between try and triumph is just a little umph.

quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.

quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.

quote: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.

quote: Never stop learning because life never stops teaching.
author: Unknown

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.

quote: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.

quote: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.

quote: What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

quote: Success is achieved by developing our strengths, not by eliminating our weaknesses.

quote: Every day is a chance to get better.
author: Unknown

quote: The will to succeed is important, but what’s more important is the will to prepare.

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.

quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.

quote: Success is dependent on effort.

quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know.

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

quote: You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.

quote: Success is a journey, not a destination.

quote: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.

quote: The purpose of learning is growth, and our minds can always continue growing.

quote: Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

quote: Success is not the absence of obstacles, but the courage to push through them.
